user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Tested on Firefox only. Please let me know on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any possible alignment issues, questions, or requests! The icons in the second screenshot are also my own work, and can be found here - [x] I hope I'm not stepping on any toes by making this when there are other similar versions available. I couldn't find any others that kept the link to the Tumblr dashboard in the logo, so I made one myself.
